Command - Interface in com.epam.controller.command
The Command interface is implemented by any class whose instances are intended to represent a command to be executed in the context of a HTTP request and response.
CommandFactory - Enum in com.epam.controller.command
The CommandFactory class is a singleton enum that serves as a factory for creating different commands for different user roles based on the command name.
CommandNames - Class in com.epam.controller.command
The CommandNames class is a final class that contains the string constant names of various commands.

A controller exception that should be thrown if the required command is not found.
